Package com.tecchtitans.eng1

Class ECSEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.Engine
      • com.tecchtitans.eng1.ECSEngine
  • public class ECSEngine
extends com.badlogic.ashley.core.Engine
    Extends the Engine class to add a currentMap field. //* @see com.badlogic.ashley.core.Engine

      • updateMap

        public void updateMap​(Map map)
        Updates the current map in the ECSEngine to a desired map.
        Parameters:

      • createUIActivityCounter

        public com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity createUIActivityCounter​(int renderX,
                                                               int renderY,
                                                               int width,
                                                               int height)
        Creates an entity that will be used in the UI to display a count for the number of times each activity has been performed.
        Parameters:
        renderX - The X location in pixels where the UI entity will be rendered.
        renderY - The Y location in pixels where the UI entity will be rendered.
        width - The width in pixels at which the UI entity will be rendered.
        height - The Height in pixels at which the UI entity will be rendered.
        Returns:
        The created UI entity that tracks activity frequency.

      • createUIDayCounter

        public com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity createUIDayCounter​(int renderX,
                                                          int renderY,
                                                          int width,
                                                          int height)
        Creates an entity that will be used in the UI to display the current day.
        Parameters:
        renderX - The X location in pixels where the UI entity will be rendered.
        renderY - The Y location in pixels where the UI entity will be rendered.
        width - The width in pixels at which the UI entity will be rendered.
        height - The Height in pixels at which the UI entity will be rendered.
        Returns:
        The created UI entity the shows the current day.

      • createBuilding

        public com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity createBuilding​(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.objects.RectangleMapObject buildingObject)
        Creates an entity that represent a building.
        Parameters:
        buildingObject - A rectangle map object that will be used as a guide to create the entity.
        Returns:
        The created building entity.

      • createPlayer

        public com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity createPlayer​(int spawnX,
                                                    int spawnY,
                                                    int width,
                                                    int height)
        Creates an entity that represents a player.
        Parameters:
        spawnX - The X position where the player will start (relative to map).
        spawnY - The Y position where the player will start (relative to map).
        width - The width of the player in pixels.
        height - The height of the player in pixels.
        Returns:
        The created player entity.
